name: 43rd Operational Excellence  Conference
intro: Whether your organization has been on the Lean journey for many years or just beginning, the Operational Excellence Conference will arm you with fresh thinking to improve your culture. Join us this fall for the 43rd conference to inspire and recharge your efforts in continuous improvement.

ta_info.location: Thanksgiving Point, 3003 Thanksgiving Way, Lehi, UT 84043
ta_info.travel:
Airport: Salt Lake City International (SLC)

If you are traveling by Frontrunner, please exit at the Lehi Station. It is a short walk to the Show Barn (large red building). Please note that Frontrunner does not run on Sunday. For those of you flying in to the event, the SLC airport has many available taxis, car rentals, or you may consider a shared-ride service. We recommend Express Shuttle. Please reserve your ride by clicking the following link: http://www.expressshuttleutah.com/.
ta_info.hotel:
Hyatt Place Salt Lake City/Lehi
3700 Outlet Pkwy,
Lehi, UT 84043
ta_info.parking: Free parking at the hotel and venue
